channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Henry Choi
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Henry Choi

item.title: Lunar Lander using DQN
item.description: OpenAI Gym provides the LunarLander-v2 environment which challenges users to train the lander agent to successfully solve the environment. The environment is considered solved when it achieves 200 reward points. This is typically achieved by successfully landing the agent on the landing pads. The agent is penalized points for crashing or firing the main engine. It is awarded points for coming to a successful stop on the landing pads as well as

item.title: Strava Running Experiment
item.description: After watching Netflix’s game changers, I challenged myself to eat a vegan diet and track any potential improvements physically.

item.title: Chapter II: Pierre Gringoire
item.description: Nevertheless, as be harangued them, the satisfaction and admiration unanimously excited by his costume were dissipated by his words; and when he reached that untoward conclusion: “As soon as his illustrious eminence, the cardinal, arrives, we will begin,” his voice was drowned in a thunder of hooting. “Begin instantly! The mystery! the mystery immediately!” shrieked the people. And above all the voices, that of Johannes de Molendino was audible, piercing the uproar like the fife’s derisive serenade: “Commence instantly!
